name: tabletopsimulator-lua
author: Rolando Romero <contact@rolandostar.com> (https://rolandostar.com/)
description: Extension for VSCode to make writing Lua scripts for Tabletop Simulator easier.

TTSLua.autoOpen.title: Automatic Open
TTSLua.autoOpen.description: Which files should vscode automatically open when receiving them from the game.
enumDescriptions: Open all received files when getting scripts
Do not open any file (Will still show files in explorer panel)

TTSLua.clearOnReload.title: Clear on Reload
TTSLua.clearOnReload.description: Enable to clear Console++ history when opening new game or reloading.

TTSLua.consoleFontSize.title: Console++ Font Size
TTSLua.consoleFontSize.description: Font size for console panel in pixels. Can also be changed with Ctrl+Scroll.

TTSLua.consoleInputHeight.title: Console++ Input Height
TTSLua.consoleInputHeight.description: Height of the command input bar at the bottom in pixels.

TTSLua.coroutinePostfix.title: Coroutine Postfix
TTSLua.coroutinePostfix.description: When automatically creating an internal coroutine function this is appended to the parent function's name

TTSLua.createXml.title: Create XML UI file when object sent from Tabletop Simulator
TTSLua.createXml.description: When an individual object is sent from Tabletop Simulator which has no XML UI, generate a blank XML file for it.

TTSLua.clearOnFocus.title: Reset to caret (>) on input focus
TTSLua.clearOnFocus.markdownDescription: Enable to clear the command input bar when using ``double click`` or ``Enter`` to focus it.

TTSLua.guidPostfix.title: GUID Postfix
TTSLua.guidPostfix.description: When guessing the getObjectFromGUID parameter this is appended to the name of the variable being assigned to

TTSLua.includeOtherFiles.title: Insert other files specified in source code
TTSLua.includeOtherFiles.markdownDescription: Convert lua lines containing ``#include <FILE>`` into the specified file's contents

TTSLua.bundleOtherFiles.title: Bundle other files specificed in source code
TTSLua.bundleOtherFiles.markdownDescription: Bundles raw lua files specified by ``require('file')`` into the calling file's content as modules

TTSLua.bundlingSearchPaths.title: Paths used to search for files to use in bundling.

TTSLua.logSave.title: Log Saves
TTSLua.logSave.description: Enable to log a message to the Console when a save occurs.

TTSLua.parameterFormat.title: Parameter TYPE & NAME Format
TTSLua.parameterFormat.markdownDescription: If you select `TYPE & NAME` above it will format like this. You may vary the case, e.g. `typeName` or `name <TYPE>`

TTSLua.parameterToDisplay.title: Function Parameters
TTSLua.parameterToDisplay.description: This will determine how autocomplete inserts parameters into your script.

badges.description: Should build correctly most of the time...
